standard_metadata.standard_description: Classify two-dimensional figures based on the presence or absence of parallel or perpendicular lines, or the presence or absence of angles of a specified size. Recognize right triangles as a category, and identify right triangles.
standard_metadata.standard_title: Classify shapes by line and angle types

question.content: The following clues will help us identify a shape:  * The shape is a quadrilateral.   * The shape has $2$ pairs of sides of equal length.   * The shape has $4$ right angles.  **Which shape matches all three clues?**

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 3 meters, 4 meters, 6 meters, and 5 meters. The shape has one set of parallel sides and has two right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 4 centimeters, 4 centimeters, 6 centimeters, and 6 centimeters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and has two right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 8 meters, and 8 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 1: The shape is a quadrilateral.  A quadrilateral is a polygon with $4$ sides.  These shapes are quadrilaterals:  [[☃ image 1]]  [[☃ image 2]]  [[☃ image 3]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 3 meters, 4 meters, 6 meters, and 5 meters. The shape has one set of parallel sides and has two right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 4 centimeters, 4 centimeters, 6 centimeters, and 6 centimeters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and has two right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 8 meters, and 8 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 2: The shape has $2$ pairs of sides of equal length.  These shapes are quadrilaterals and have $2$ pairs of equal side lengths:  [[☃ image 1]]  [[☃ image 2]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 4 centimeters, 4 centimeters, 6 centimeters, and 6 centimeters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and has two right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 8 meters, and 8 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 3: The shape has $4$ right angles.  This shape is a quadrilateral, has $2$ pairs of equal side lengths and has $4$ right angles:   [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 8 meters, and 8 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.

hints.content: This shape matches all three clues:     [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 8 meters, and 8 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.

question.content: The following clues will help us identify a shape:  * The shape has at least one pair of parallel sides.   * The shape is a quadrilateral.    * The shape has no right angles.    **Which shape matches all three clues?**

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 9 meters, and 9 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.
A shape with five sides of equal length each measuring 5 meters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 10 meters, 10 meters, 8 meters, and 8 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 1:  The shape has at least one pair of parallel sides.    These shapes have **at least** one pair of parallel sides.   [[☃ image 2]] [[☃ image 3]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 10 meters, 10 meters, 8 meters, and 8 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 9 meters, and 9 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 2: The shape is a quadrilateral.  A quadrilateral is a polygon with $4$ sides.  These shapes have at least one pair of parallel sides and are quadrilaterals:  [[☃ image 1]]  [[☃ image 2]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 10 meters, 10 meters, 8 meters, and 8 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 9 meters, and 9 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 3: The shape has no right angles.    This shape has two pairs of parallel sides, is a quadrilateral, and has no right angles:  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 9 meters, and 9 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.

hints.content: This shape matches all three clues:    [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 9 meters, and 9 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.

question.content: The following clues will help us identify a shape:  * The shape is a quadrilateral.    * The shape has no right angles.   * The shape has $4$ sides of equal length.  **Which shape matches all three clues?**

images.alt: A quadrilateral with side lengths of 4 meters, 6 meters, 5 meters, and 3 meters. The shape has  2 right angles.
A quadrilateral with each side measuring 6 meters. The shape does not have right angles.
A quadrilateral with side lengths of 5 meters, 9 meters, 5 meters, and 9 meters. The shape does not have right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 1: The shape is a quadrilateral.  A quadrilateral is a polygon with $4$ sides.  These shapes are quadrilaterals:   [[☃ image 1]]   [[☃ image 2]]    [[☃ image 3]]

images.alt: A quadrilateral with side lengths of 4 meters, 6 meters, 5 meters, and 3 meters. The shape has 2 right angles.
A quadrilateral with each side measuring 6 meters. The shape does not have right angles.
A quadrilateral with side lengths of 5 meters, 9 meters, 5 meters, and 9 meters. The shape does not have right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 2: The shape has no right angles.    These shapes are quadrilaterals with no right angles:    [[☃ image 1]]   [[☃ image 2]]

images.alt: A quadrilateral with each side measuring 6 meters. The shape does not have right angles.
A quadrilateral with side lengths of 5 meters, 9 meters, 5 meters, and 9 meters. The shape does not have right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 3: The shape has $4$ sides of equal length.  This shape is a quadrilateral, has no right angles, and has $4$ sides of equal length:    [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A quadrilateral with each side measuring 6 meters. The shape does not have right angles.

hints.content: This shape matches all three clues:      [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A quadrilateral with each side measuring 6 meters.  The shape does not have right angles.

question.content: The following clues will help us identify a shape:  * The shape is a quadrilateral.      * The shape does not have $4$ right angles.   * The shape has only $1$ pair of parallel sides.    **Which shape matches all three clues?**

images.alt: A shape with three sides of equal length each measuring 4 meters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 4 meters, 6 meters, 6 meters, and 7 meters. The shape has one set of parallel sides and does not have right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 9 meters, and 9 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 1: The shape is a quadrilateral.  A quadrilateral is a polygon with $4$ sides.  These shapes are quadrilaterals:  [[☃ image 2]] [[☃ image 3]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 4 meters, 6 meters, 6 meters, and 7 meters. The shape has one set of parallel sides and does not have right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 9 meters, and 9 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 2: The shape does not have $4$ right angles.    These shapes are quadrilateral and do not have $4$ right angles:  [[☃ image 1]] [[☃ image 2]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 4 meters, 6 meters, 6 meters, and 7 meters. The shape has one set of parallel sides and does not have right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 9 meters, and 9 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 3: The shape has only $1$ pair of parallel sides.   This shape is a quadrilateral, does not have $4$ right angles, and has only $1$ pair of parallel sides:   [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 4 meters, 6 meters, 6 meters, and 7 meters. The shape has one set of parallel sides and does not have right angles.

hints.content: This shape matches all three clues:     [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 4 meters, 6 meters, 6 meters, and 7 meters. The shape has one set of parallel sides and does not have right angles.

question.content: The following clues will help us identify a shape:  * All sides have equal length.   * All angles have equal measure.   * The shape has no right angles.    **Which shape matches all three clues?**

images.alt: A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 6 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have any right angles.
A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 7 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.
A shape with six sides of equal length each measuring 8 meters. The shape has three sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles. The shape has 6 equal angle measures.

hints.content: ###Hint 1: All sides have equal length.    These shapes have equal side lengths:   [[☃ image 1]] [[☃ image 2]] [[☃ image 3]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 6 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.
A shape with six sides of equal length each measuring 8 meters. The shape has three sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles. The shape has 6 equal angle measures.
A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 7 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles

hints.content: ###Hint 2: All angles have equal measure.   These shapes have equal side lengths and equal angle measures:  [[☃ image 1]] [[☃ image 2]]

images.alt: A shape with six sides of equal length each measuring 8 meters. The shape has three sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles. The shape has 6 equal angle measures.
A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 7 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles

hints.content: ###Hint 3: The shape has no right angles.   This shape has equal side lengths, equal angle measures, and no right angles:  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with six sides of equal length each measuring 8 meters. The shape has three sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles. The shape has 6 equal angle measures.

hints.content: This shape matches all three clues:    [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with six sides of equal length each measuring 8 meters. The shape has three sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles. The shape has 6 equal angle measures.

question.content: The following clues will help us identify a shape:  * The shape has no right angles.   * The shape has no pairs of sides of equal length.   * The shape is not a triangle.    **Which shape matches all three clues?**

images.alt: A shape with eight sides of equal length each measuring 4 meters. The shape has four sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.
A shape with three sides measuring 6 meters, 8 meters, and 9 meters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.
A round shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 1: The shape has no right angles.    These shapes have no right angles.    [[☃ image 1]] [[☃ image 2]] [[☃ image 3]]

images.alt: A shape with eight sides of equal length each measuring 4 meters. The shape has four sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.
A shape with three sides measuring 6 meters, 8 meters, and 9 meters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.
A round shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 2: The shape has no pairs of sides of equal length.    These shapes have no right angles and no pairs of equal side lengths.    [[☃ image 1]]  [[☃ image 2]]

images.alt: A shape with three sides measuring 6 meters, 8 meters, and 9 meters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.
A round shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 3: The shape is not a triangle.    This shape has no right angles, no pairs of equal side lengths, and is not a triangle.    [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A round shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.

hints.content: This shape matches all three clues:     [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A round shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.

question.content: The following clues will help us identify a shape:  * The shape is a quadrilateral.   * All angles are right angles.   * All sides have equal length.    **Which shape matches all three clues?**

images.alt: A shape with eight sides of equal length each measuring 2 meters. The shape has four sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.
A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 6 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.
A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 3 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 1: The shape is a quadrilateral.  A quadrilateral is a polygon with $4$ sides.  These shapes are quadrilaterals:  [[☃ image 1]] [[☃ image 2]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 6 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have right angles.
A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 3 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 2: All angles are right angles.  This shape is a quadrilateral and has all right angles:  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 3 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 3: All sides have equal length.    This shape is a quadrilateral, has all right angles, and all sides have equal lengths:  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 3 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.

hints.content: This shape matches all three clues:     [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 3 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.

A shape with four sides measuring 4 centimeters, 4 centimeters, 6 centimeters, and 6 centimeters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and has two right angles.
A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 3 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 2: The shape is a quadrilateral.  A quadrilateral is a polygon with $4$ sides.  These shapes are quadrilaterals and have $2$ pairs of equal side lengths:  [[☃ image 1]] [[☃ image 2]] [[☃ image 3]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 8 meters, and 8 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and has four right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 4 centimeters, 4 centimeters, 6 centimeters, and 6 centimeters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and has two right angles.

hints.content: ###Hint 3: The shape does not have $4$ right angles.  This shape is a quadrilateral, has $2$ pairs of equal side lengths, and does not have a $4$ right angles:  [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 4 centimeters, 4 centimeters, 6 centimeters, and 6 centimeters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and has two right angles.

hints.content: This shape matches all three clues:    [[☃ image 1]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 4 centimeters, 4 centimeters, 6 centimeters, and 6 centimeters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and has two right angles.

question.content: Bella sorted shapes in two groups.  Group A | Group B - | - | -  |   |   |   **Which of these rules did Bella use to sort the shapes?**

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 3 meters, 4 meters, 6 meters, and 5 meters. The shape has one set of parallel sides and has two right angles.
A round shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 4 centimeters, 4 centimeters, 6 centimeters, and 6 centimeters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and has two right angles.
A shape with three sides measuring 6 meters, 8 meters, and 9 meters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.
A shape with four sides of equal length each measuring 6 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have any right angles.
A shape with eight sides of equal length each measuring 2 meters. The shape has four sets of parallel sides and does not have any right angles.

options.content: All shapes in Group A are equilateral, but no shapes in the Group B are equilateral.
All shapes in Group A are quadrilaterals, but no shapes in Group B are quadrilaterals.

hints.content: Equilateral shapes have all sides of equal length.  Quadrilaterals are polygons with $4$ sides.
###Equilateral shapes  These shapes from group A are *not* equilateral.  [[☃ image 1]] [[☃ image 2]]

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 3 meters, 4 meters, 6 meters, and 5 meters. The shape has one set of parallel sides and has two right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 4 centimeters, 4 centimeters, 6 centimeters, and 6 centimeters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and has two right angles.

hints.content: ###Quadrilaterals  Group A has all quadrilaterals, and Group B has no quadrilaterals.

question.content: Amir sorted shapes in two groups.  Group A | Group B - | - | - |   |   |   **Which of these rules did Amir use to sort the shapes?**

images.alt: A shape with four sides measuring 5 meters, 5 meters, 9 meters, and 9 meters. The shape has two sets of parallel sides and does not have any right angles.
A shape with six sides of equal length each measuring 8 meters. The shape has three sets of parallel sides and does not have any right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 3 meters, 4 meters, 6 meters, and 5 meters. The shape has one set of parallel sides and has two right angles.
A shape with three sides measuring 3 meters, 4 meters, and 5 meters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.
A shape with four sides measuring 6 meters, 6 meters, 8 meters, and 8 meters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and has two right angles.
A shape with five sides of equal length each measuring 5 meters. The shape does not have any sides that are parallel and does not have any right angles.

options.content: All shapes in Group A have a pair of parallel sides and no shapes in Group B have a pair of parallel sides.
All shapes in Group A are quadrilaterals, but no shapes in Group B are quadrilaterals.

hints.content: Parallel lines always remain the same distance apart and therefore never intersect, like the pair of lines below.   [[☃ image 1]]  Quadrilaterals are polygons with $4$ sides.

images.alt: Two lines that will never cross.

hints.content: ###Parallel lines  This shape from Group B has parallel sides:  [[☃ image 2]]

images.alt: A shape with six sides of equal length each measuring 8 meters. The shape has three sets of parallel sides and does not have any right angles.

hints.content: ###Quadrilaterals  Group A has all quadrilaterals, and Group B has no quadrilaterals.
